Structs/NetworkResponse.html#/s:14SwiftN.name: data
Structs/NetworkResponse.html#/s:14SwiftN.abstract: The raw data returned from the network request.

Structs/NetworkResponse.html#/s:14SwiftN.name: URLResponse
Structs/NetworkResponse.html#/s:14SwiftN.abstract: The URL response returned from the network request.

Structs/NetworkRequest.html#/s:14SwiftNe.name: method
Structs/NetworkRequest.html#/s:14SwiftNe.abstract: The HTTP method for the network request.

Structs/NetworkError.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: detailedDescription
Structs/NetworkError.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: A detailed description of the network error, combining the error case description and the API message if available.

Structs/NetworkError.html.name: NetworkError
Structs/NetworkError.html.abstract: A custom error type representing various network-related errors.

Structs/NetworkResponse.html.name: NetworkResponse
Structs/NetworkResponse.html.abstract: A structure representing the response from a network request.

Structs/Response.html.name: Response
Structs/Response.html.abstract: A structure representing a response from a network request.

Protocols/NetworkerProtocol.html#/s:14Sw.name: perform(_:completion:)
Protocols/NetworkerProtocol.html#/s:14Sw.abstract: Performs a simple network request with a completion handler.

Protocols/NetworkerProtocol.html#/s:14Sw.name: perform(_:responseModel:completion:)
Protocols/NetworkerProtocol.html#/s:14Sw.abstract: Performs a network request and decodes the response into a specified model type with a completion handler.

Protocols/NetworkerProtocol.html#/s:14Sw.name: performUpload(_:data:completion:)
Protocols/NetworkerProtocol.html#/s:14Sw.abstract: Performs an upload request with a completion handler.

Protocols/NetworkerProtocol.html#/s:14Sw.name: performDownload(_:completion:)
Protocols/NetworkerProtocol.html#/s:14Sw.abstract: Performs a download request with a completion handler.

Protocols/ErrorHandlerProtocol.html#/s:1.name: handle(_:data:response:)
Protocols/ErrorHandlerProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: Handles an error and its associated URL response, returning a NetworkError.

Protocols/AsyncNetworkerProtocol.html#/s.name: performAsync(_:responseModel:)
Protocols/AsyncNetworkerProtocol.html#/s.abstract: Performs a network request and decodes the response into a specified model type asynchronously.

Protocols/AsyncNetworkerProtocol.html.name: AsyncNetworkerProtocol
Protocols/AsyncNetworkerProtocol.html.abstract: A protocol that defines the methods for performing asynchronous network requests.

Protocols/ErrorHandlerProtocol.html.name: ErrorHandlerProtocol
Protocols/ErrorHandlerProtocol.html.abstract: A protocol defining the contract for error handling.

Protocols/NetworkerProtocol.html.name: NetworkerProtocol
Protocols/NetworkerProtocol.html.abstract: A protocol defining the methods for a networker.

Enums/NetworkErrorCases.html#/s:14SwiftN.name: description
Enums/NetworkErrorCases.html#/s:14SwiftN.abstract: Provides a textual description of the error.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: ok
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The request has succeeded.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: created
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The request has been fulfilled and resulted in a new resource being created.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: accepted
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The request has been accepted for processing, but the processing has not been completed.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: noContent
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The server successfully processed the request and is not returning any content.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: multipleChoices
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: Indicates multiple options for the resource that the client may follow.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: movedPermanently
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: This and all future requests should be directed to the given URI.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: found
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The resource was found at another URI.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: seeOther
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The response to the request can be found under another URI.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: notModified
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: Indicates that the resource has not been modified since the version specified by the request headers.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: useProxy
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The requested resource is only available through a proxy.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: temporaryRedirect
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The resource resides temporarily under a different URI.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: permanentRedirect
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The resource resides permanently under a different URI.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: badRequest
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: unauthorized
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The client must authenticate itself to get the requested response.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: forbidden
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The client does not have access rights to the content.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: notFound
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The server can not find the requested resource.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: internalServerError
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: notImplemented
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The request method is not supported by the server and cannot be handled.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: badGateway
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The server, while acting as a gateway or proxy, received an invalid response from the upstream server.

Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: serviceUnavailable
Enums/HTTPStatusCode.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: The server is not ready to handle the request.

Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:14SwiftNetworke.name: get
Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:14SwiftNetworke.abstract: The GET method requests a representation of the specified resource.

Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:14SwiftNetworke.name: patch
Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:14SwiftNetworke.abstract: The PATCH method is used to apply partial modifications to a resource.

Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:14SwiftNetworke.name: post
Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:14SwiftNetworke.abstract: The POST method is used to submit an entity to the specified resource.

Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:14SwiftNetworke.name: put
Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:14SwiftNetworke.abstract: The PUT method replaces all current representations of the target resource with the request payload.

Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:14SwiftNetworke.name: delete
Enums/HTTPMethod.html#/s:14SwiftNetworke.abstract: The DELETE method deletes the specified resource.

Enums/NetworkErrorCases.html.name: NetworkErrorCases
Enums/NetworkErrorCases.html.abstract: An enumeration representing various types of network-related errors, each with a custom description.

Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.name: init(errorHandler:logger:)
Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.abstract: Initializes the Networker with optional error handler and logger.

Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.name: cancelTask(withId:)
Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.abstract: Cancels a task with a given UUID.

Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.name: lock()
Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.abstract: Locks the Networker class to prevent new requests from being made.

Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.name: unlock()
Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.abstract: Unlocks the Networker class to allow new requests to be made.

Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.name: perform(_:completion:)
Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.abstract: Performs a simple network request with a completion handler.

Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.name: perform(_:responseModel:completion:)
Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.abstract: Performs a network request and decodes the response into a specified model type with a completion handler.

Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.name: performUpload(_:data:completion:)
Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.abstract: Performs an upload request with a completion handler.

Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.name: performDownload(_:completion:)
Classes/Networker.html#/s:14SwiftNetwork.abstract: Performs a download request with a completion handler.

Classes/ErrorHandler.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.name: handle(_:data:response:)
Classes/ErrorHandler.html#/s:14SwiftNetw.abstract: Handles an error and its associated URL response, returning a NetworkError.

Classes/AsyncNetworker.html#/s:14SwiftNe.name: init(errorHandler:logger:)
Classes/AsyncNetworker.html#/s:14SwiftNe.abstract: Initializes the Networker with optional error handler and logger.

Classes/AsyncNetworker.html#/s:14SwiftNe.name: performAsync(_:responseModel:)
Classes/AsyncNetworker.html#/s:14SwiftNe.abstract: Performs a network request and decodes the response into a specified model type asynchronously.

Classes/AsyncNetworker.html.name: AsyncNetworker
Classes/AsyncNetworker.html.abstract: A class responsible for making network requests and handling responses.

Classes/ErrorHandler.html.name: ErrorHandler
Classes/ErrorHandler.html.abstract: A class responsible for handling various types of errors and converting them into NetworkError instances.

Classes/Logger.html.name: Logger
Classes/Logger.html.abstract: A logger class to log network requests, responses, and errors.

Classes/Networker.html.name: Networker
Classes/Networker.html.abstract: A class responsible for making network requests and handling responses.
